column1: ** Borondir and his companion are on their way in search of the Éothéod.
** Gollum leads Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee into Shelobs Lair.
** Faramir has to retreat to the Causeway Forts.
** Aragorn drives the enemy towards Pelargir.
** The Ents overcome the invaders of Rohan.
